channel.title: Thoughts on Eydís
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Eydís

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Dear guests! Browse freely! Hopefully you will enjoy your stay and find some thing or another of interest to you.

item.title: Mister and Blister
item.description:
Make myself feel good?

Wouldn’t life be better if everybody was happy with themselves and what they have? So happy that there were no need for envy or selfishness?

But this can sometimes be quite tricky.

item.title: The Little Child
item.description:
Enjoy life and be happy! Be whoever you want to be!

This is what we should be saying to our kids. Instead of forcing stereotypes.

A book to show children that you don’t have to be who your gender colour says you should be and that it is ok to be whoever you want to be.

item.title: Hello and Welcome
item.description: Your local companion to the National Museum of Iceland.

item.title: Life, the Treasure Map and something or another.
item.description:
Life, the Treasure Map and something or another.

A boy is being bullied. But that happens all the time, doesn’t it? For this boy, however, life takes an unexpected turn, and he will discover what he is really made of when he finds that which was hidden a long time ago.

A short story suitable for all ages.
